front.title: Ethics Search Protocol (ESP) for Internet Search Engines

abstract.t: This document contains a specification for imprints, ethicalpolicies and social contracts, the annotation of these, as wellas the annotation of arbitrary content that can be referencedby fully qualified URIs, the submission of digitally signed ticketsconcerning imprints, ethical policies, social contracts orannotations, and a search interface for internet search engines.
